hero.title: We're Here to Help You 24/7
hero.subtitle: Get in touch with our healthcare team for appointments, questions, or emergency care.

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.description: Have a question or need to schedule an appointment? Fill out the form and we'll get back to you soon.

visit.title: Visit Our Facility
visit.description: Our modern medical facility is located in the heart of Pune, easily accessible with ample parking.

emergency.description: For medical emergencies, call us immediately or visit our emergency department.

bottomEmergency.title: Need Emergency Help?
bottomEmergency.subtitle: Our emergency team is available 24/7 for urgent medical situations.
